summary: Want to play on Master Difficulty where you do a quarter of the damage of the enemy, but not get 1-shot because an archer caught you off guard? Then this mod might be for you. *Also taking requests*
descriptionHtml:
The problem I ran into while playing on Master Difficulty on most characters is that at low levels I had to be extremely cautious when doing dungeons. That lead to way too much sneaking and hiding around corners while waiting for alerted enemies to go back to normal. I had to pick off one guy at a time so that I wouldn\'t be taking on 3 or more enemies at a time that could slice through me like butter. I enjoy the challenge of doing less damage, but I don\'t like being spread on toast.

On the contrary, at high levels on Master Difficulty I could just 1 shot anything I came across because with maxed out Blacksmithing and Enchanting I could make a bad ass Daedric Bow and have 4 pieces of Fortify Archery gear. Nothing could stand a chance. So now I\'m the one doing too much damage.

Vanilla Difficulties are as follows:
Novice: You do 2x damage and take 50% less. (Ratio 4:1)
Apprentice: You do 1.5x damage and take 25% less. (Ratio 2:1)
Adept: You do normal damage and take normal damage. (Ratio 1:1)
Expert: You do 25% less damage and take 1.5x more damage. (Ratio 1:2)
Master: You do 50% less damage and take 2x more damage. (Ratio 1:4)

My New Difficulty settings are as follows:
Novice: You do normal damage and take 75% less damage. (Ratio 4:1)
Apprentice: You do normal damage and take 50% less damage. (Ratio 2:1)
Adept: You do normal damage and take normal damage. (Ratio 1:1)
Expert: You do 50% less damage and take normal damage. (Ratio 1:2)
Master: You do 75% less damage and take normal damage. (Ratio 1:4)

As you can see, the damage ratios stay the same. Ultimately this should smooth out huge damage incoming early in game, and the huge out-going damage later in game.

***Added Optional File for more of a challenge. Don\'t use both files at once.***
Novice: You do 2x damage and take 75% less damage. (Ratio 8:1)
Apprentice: You do 1.5x damage and take 50% less damage. (Ratio 3:1)
Adept: You do normal damage and take normal damage. (Ratio 1:1)
Expert: You do 50% less damage and take 1.5x more damage. (Ratio 1:3)
Master: You do 75% less damage and take 2x more damage. (Ratio 1:8) 

I figured this type of mod is easy enough that I will take requests. Enjoy.
author: DaBritt87
